query: WITH entities AS (SELECT credit_facility_payment_idx, id FROM core_payments WHERE (COALESCE((credit_facility_payment_idx, id) < ($3, $2), $2 IS NULL)) ORDER BY credit_facility_payment_idx DESC, id DESC LIMIT $1) SELECT i.id AS "entity_id: PaymentId", e.sequence, e.event, e.recorded_at FROM entities i JOIN core_payment_events e ON i.id = e.id ORDER BY i.credit_facility_payment_idx desc, i.id desc, i.id, e.sequence
